  physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are \u0027L\u0027 shaped
 featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings are decorated with stylized foliage
 animals
 and deities. The panels of images are bordered by scrolling geometric patterns.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings are decorated with stylized foliage, animals, and deities. The panels of images are bordered by scrolling geometric patterns.
